function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Assessment of workplace measures for preventing and controlling SARS-CoV-2 transmission","Impact":"Potential spread of SARS-CoV-2 within the workplace","Mitigation":"Implementing effective infection prevention and control measures","Technologies":"Surveillance systems, contact tracing technology","People":"Employees, healthcare workers, residents of nursing homes, workers in various industries","Owner":"Employers, workplace administrators, healthcare institutions"}]}
